tasks.title: Day 1: Welcome & Workspace
tasks.description: Meet your manager, get your laptop set up, and log into the HR portal.

tasks.title: Security training
tasks.description: Complete mandatory security and compliance training modules.

tasks.title: Meet your onboarding buddy
tasks.description: Have a 30-minute call with your buddy to understand team norms.

tasks.title: First sprint goals
tasks.description: Review sprint plan with your manager and pair on your first ticket.
